insert.selectKey: select count(1) from E_IM_INVESTMENT where invid = #{invid}
insert.if:
insert into E_IM_INVESTMENT ( invid, pripid, entname, regno, uniscid, inv, s_ext_fromnode, s_ext_datatime
) values ( #{invid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pripid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uniscid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inv, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 440300, SYSDATE )
